title: Introducing a new methodology for enrolling students from Grade 2 to Grade 11 in Schools (except Grade 6)
decision_details:
- The proposal made by the Minister of Education to introduce a new methodology 
	providing fair and equal opportunities to all students by further regulating circular provisions being implemented for the admission of children from Grade 2 to Grade 11 in Schools (except Grade 6) thereby identifying  groups that really need to transfer schools in the intermediate grades and to maintain under the same methodology, the current maximum number of students in each class of Grades 1-5 as 40 and the maximum number of students in each class of Grades 6-11 as 45, without change, was approved by the Cabinet.
